short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click access to enhanced Workbench™ for Salesforce™

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the Quirkbench extension you can copy a Salesforce Id or a Salesforce Object API name to clipboard and explore it in Workbench™ with a single click or a keyboard shortcut.

Adds "Quick Query"* and "New" buttons to the object describe page in Workbench™

Adds "Upsert" and "New" buttons to the record details page in Workbench™.

Speed up the login by defining default login options. 

--

*Quick Query button takes you to the Query page and automatically runs a simple SOQL query [SELECT Id, Name FROM YourObject LIMIT 10] for quick access to sample records of a given object.
